body_html:
@vinceyuan I came across the same problem with you at the top. But

  1. Download makefile dependencies by running tensorflow/contrib/makefile/download_dependencies.sh
  2. Manually copy protobuf and re2 folders from tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads to tensorflow/contrib/lite/downloads

doesn't work for me. My bazel version is 0.8.0. Have you solved the problem?

body:
@vinceyuan  I came across the same problem with you at the top. But 

> 1. Download makefile dependencies by running tensorflow/contrib/makefile/download_dependencies.sh 
> 2. Manually copy protobuf and re2 folders from tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads to tensorflow/contrib/lite/downloads

doesn't work for me. My bazel version is 0.8.0. Have you solved the problem?
